column1: Services will be 1:30 p.m. Friday at First Lutheran Church in South Sioux City with the Rev. Kelley Pedersen officiating. Military graveside services will be in Memorial Park Cemetery.   Visitation will be Thursday at Becker ï¿½ Hunt Funeral Home in South Sioux City from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m. with a prayer service at 7 p.m.
